Description: Ostracon, fragment of body of the pale-red pottery storage-vessel, fabric is grey in section, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip, which has flaked away in many places, and very faint traces of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393556) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393556)
